cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1.0)

project(LiveGrapher)

add_subdirectory(fmt)

set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)

find_package(Qt5 COMPONENTS Network Widgets PrintSupport REQUIRED)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED TRUE)

include_directories("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}")
file(GLOB SRCS
    "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.qrc"
    "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp"
    )
add_executable(LiveGrapher ${SRCS})

# C4127 (conditional expression is constant) is generated by Qt internals
target_compile_options(LiveGrapher PRIVATE
  $<$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>:/W4 /WX /wd4127>
  $<$<NOT:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>>:-Wall -Wextra -pedantic -Werror -Wno-unused-parameter>
)
target_link_libraries(LiveGrapher Qt5::Network Qt5::Widgets Qt5::PrintSupport fmt)
